replies.msg: My friend Jason works as an accounting manager in Foodpanda. If he takes the job at big 4 he'll be foir thousand dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was three years ago when he was working beneath everyone else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CFA exam he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales instead of accounting his salary would be much lower. If it wasn't for his uncle's referral his career wouldn't take off now and he wouldn't start earning a lot of money. He's been having a crush on this girl named joyce but Joyce has a boyfriend. His brother said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just only worth it. His mum said "you'll be better off without her" His auntie also said "you'd be better off without her" He's a science fiction fan. He said "if starships would exist I would quite by job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" His sister married her childhood sweetheart recently. Her dad felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle too feels her husband is beneath her. She enjoys socializing with the better off. Last month jason was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After his trip I said "if you should travel there again can you get me a pack of white lover cookies please?" Jason is a computer expert. His cousin Samuel has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but he's having problems with his computer. If Jason will go and fix his computer samuel will be so thankful for his help. Samuel also has an exam next monday so he is better off revising over the weekend. Jason is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan has recently won his retirement fight. He's deeply grateful to his coaches and thankful that he has got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see Fred versus randy. If Fred would sign a contract with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. After randy read the terms and conditions of the contract Dana's assistant said "if you would just sign here please" Jason's younger brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "if it'll make you happy I'll come to stay for two nights as company for you while your colleagues are away" By the end of the next century scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships I'm gonna ask physics professor Dr. Chow about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture room at twenty five of seven. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at ten after two but my friend said "don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet" It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet. I saw joey's concert live at the hong kong Coliseum twice with my friend which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time I saw her concert we were late. I remember I said "look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was twenty after seven. The concert would've started by then. Jason gave a house party last Tuesday. As some of us wanted to watch the news, I said "if I could just turn on the TV" He then said "sure. If you would switch to the news channel"
